nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens (DK Readers)

LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens is a Level 2 DK Children book recommended for ages 5–7, which adapts the story of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The book contains fun facts, diagrams and activities, as well as photographic images to complement the text, providing strong visual clues to build vocabulary and confidence for kids who are beginning to read fluently with support. The book is 48 pages long and is written by David Fentiman.
